name: Underground Passage
short_description: The damp stone passage echos with a constant dripping noise.
long_description: The damp stone passage is dim save for a few rifts in the ceiling letting in the day's sunlight. A constant dripping sound echos throughout the passage.

trapdoor.description: An old wooden trapdoor with an iron handle accessible by a series of stone steps. It is rusted and cracked with age.

hickory door.description: The wood shimmers with an otherworldly light and is engraved with strange patterns. Though cracked in a few places, it appears otherwise untouched.

rusty sword.description: The remains of what was once likely a beautiful sword, rusted with age. The metal is engraved with strange symbols that shimmer a rainbow of colors when caught in the light.

collapsed passage.description: A large pile of rocks and other debris block the passage to the east. Gaps in the ceiling above provide the room's only source of light.
